hydrologistmod:Aqueducts.NAME: Aqueducts
hydrologistmod:Aqueducts.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw an extra card, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

hydrologistmod:BranchingCreeks.NAME: Branching Creeks
hydrologistmod:BranchingCreeks.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you hydrologistmod:Transmute a card, choose between !M! additional cards.

hydrologistmod:FogOfWar.NAME: Fog of War
hydrologistmod:FogOfWar.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Weak.

hydrologistmod:IceBarrier.NAME: Ice Barrier
hydrologistmod:IceBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When hydrologistmod:Transmuted, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

hydrologistmod:GhostlyMist.NAME: Ghostly Mist
hydrologistmod:GhostlyMist.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you played a hydrologistmod:Corporeal card this turn, deal !D! damage again.

hydrologistmod:Hailstorm.NAME: Hailstorm
hydrologistmod:Hailstorm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you play an Ice card, the enemy takes !M! damage.

hydrologistmod:PureIce.NAME: Pure Ice
hydrologistmod:PureIce.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When hydrologistmod:Transmuted, gain !B! Block.

hydrologistmod:PureWater.NAME: Pure Water
hydrologistmod:PureWater.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: hydrologistmod:Flow. NL Draw a card. NL When hydrologistmod:Transmuted, hydrologistmod:Flow.

hydrologistmod:RiverOfTime.NAME: River Of Time
hydrologistmod:RiverOfTime.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next hydrologistmod:Swappable card is also played *Swapped.
hydrologistmod:RiverOfTime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next 2 hydrologistmod:Swappable cards are also played *Swapped.

hydrologistmod:ScaldingGeyser.NAME: Scalding Geyser
hydrologistmod:ScaldingGeyser.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

hydrologistmod:SoothingWater.NAME: Soothing Water
hydrologistmod:SoothingWater.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Fleeting. NL hydrologistmod:On_Swap: permanently increase this card's healing by 4 and Exhaust. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.
hydrologistmod:SoothingWater.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Fleeting. NL hydrologistmod:On_Swap: permanently increase this card's healing by 6 and Exhaust. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:SteamLash.NAME: Steam Lash
hydrologistmod:SteamLash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable. NL hydrologistmod:On_Swap: Gain [E].

hydrologistmod:TidalWave.NAME: Tidal Wave
hydrologistmod:TidalWave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:WallOfIce.NAME: Wall of Ice
hydrologistmod:WallOfIce.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable.

hydrologistmod:WaterWhip.NAME: Water Whip
hydrologistmod:WaterWhip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL hydrologistmod:Swappable. NL hydrologistmod:On_Swap: Lose [E].
